nodes.text: Cal Falcone was the Prime Minister of the Corellian Council during the early days of the renewed Great Galactic War between the reconstituted Sith Empire and the Galactic Republic. Falcone and many other Council members sold out to the Empire and voted to join the Empire in conjunction with Darth Decimus' invasion, allowing the Sith to gain control of the planet almost immediately. Falcone was killed by Darth Tormen several weeks later for failing to suppress the civilian resistance.
